author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The Aces Solo and CoOp game system for Battletech: Alpha Strike has been in development since the Mercenaries Kickstarter and the box set has finally landed here at the Studio. Logan Wolfe's Dragoons are on their way to Appolakkia to take on the Jade Falcons on behest of the Mercantile League. 

Having brought the heat to the Jade Falcons the Dragoons fall back to defend the locals, hoping to get their support for the coming war!

The box is available HERE: https://store.catalystgamelabs.com/products/battletech-aces-scouring-sands

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens availa
title: Battletech: ACES - Scouring Sands - Part 2 - 'Not One Step More'
